General.Name: Shanghai Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Construction Group Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company in China and internationally. The company constructs highrise buildings, bridges, railways, public culture and sport facilities, industrial plants, environment protection projects, etc. It also invests in, constructs, and operates urban infrastructure. In addition, the company engages in the provision of design consultancy services; and real estate development activities, including real estate development and construction, sales, leasing, and property management services. Shanghai Construction Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shanghai, China.
